description: Numerator of the expected time to finish a random Tower of Hanoi problem with n disks using optimal moves.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,500
example: a(2)=2 since there are nine equally likely possibilities, with times required of 0,1,1,2,2,3,3,3,3 giving an average of 18/9=2/1.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 05 2001
